item.title: Vear
item.description: I made this logo for the ritual noise project Vear inspired by occult symbolism and sigils. Logo for vear, occult-like symbols and letters overlapping each others

item.title: Blood and Dust
item.description: Logo and visuals for the ritualistic horror drone project I’m doing with Hex. You can find more over on our band website: https://blood-and-dust.com/
